page.title: 03Life Styles
page.content: This rural area has very few clubs nearby. However people do have hobbies such as photography. For farmers there is a club where they can talk about crops and livestock etc. The younger population like to go to{nightclubs and{discos}out of this area. Shopping has become a major part in the life of people. This area has very few shops so people shop in Thornbury or Bristol. In Thornbury every Saturday there is a{market}which has a variety of goods. The current fitness trend has caused the nearby sports centre to be built. Nowadays a treat is to eat at pubs or restaurants which saves preparation and serving of food. {Summary}: People do not like to mix work with pleasure.
